name: TAHAWEEL
description:
You are stuck in this nightmare

If you want to escape from this nightmare
you need to defeat the witch which gave you 
the poison candy

you need to clear all levels and 
defeat all witch's allies to meet The Witch

Controls:

WASD for movement

Hold LEFT SHIFT to run

SPACE for jump

Hold RMB + Press LMB for attacking

ESC to show pause panel or close it
